summary.span: 表示一个基于原型的对象，该对象由构造函数定义。

span.span: Represents a prototype-based object that is defined by a constructor function.

summary.span: 大多数构造函数类（比如 、、 和 ）都从此类继承。

span.span: Most of the constructor function classes, such as , , , and , inherit from this class.

summary.span: 此类属于对象和函数类别。

span.span: This class belongs to the objects and functions category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 父级是向其对象委托请求的属性的对象或自身未实现的方法。The parent is the object to which the object delegates requests for properties or methods that it does not implement itself. 例如，当创建使用，则父级是。For example, when you create a by using a , the parent is a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常充当一个构造函数调用或创建实例。 often acts as a constructor or create instance call.

span.span: The object on which to invoke the member.

param.span: 此对象必须为当前脚本对象。

span.span: This must be the current script object.

param.name: args
param.span: 包含要调用的成员的参数数目、顺序和类型的对象数组。

span.span: An array of objects that contains the number, order, and type of the parameters of the member to be invoked.

param.span: 如果没有参数，则这是一个空数组。

span.span: This is an empty array if there are no parameters.

param.name: modifiers
param.span: 长度与 args 参数相同的数组。

span.span: An array that has the same length as the args parameter.

param.span: 它表示元数据中被调用成员的参数特性。

span.span: It represents the invoked member's argument attributes in the metadata.

param.span: 用于正确设置数字、日期和字符串的格式。

span.span: Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.
An array of parameters.
Invokes the specified member.
The return value of the call to the member.
